name: moneyquest-v3
description: GDPR & SOC 2 Type II compliant personal finance web application

scripts.install:packages: npm install --prefix packages/frontend && npm install --prefix packages/backend && npm install --prefix packages/shared && npm install --prefix packages/infrastructure
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:infrastructure
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:gdpr: echo 'GDPR compliance tests not configured yet'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:shared
scripts.db:setup: echo 'Database setup - Run PostgreSQL locally or use Docker'
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run cdk:deploy --prefix packages/infrastructure
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run cdk:deploy --prefix packages/infrastructure

author: MoneyQuestV3 Team
